attributes.action: Do not let the government end the legal requirement to self isolate
attributes.additional_details: Letting people who know they're infected pass on this still deadly disease to those who wont survive it is murder on a genocidal scale. This HAS to be stopped, or people are literally going to be walking around killing people. Vulnerable people throughout this pandemic have been absolutely failed by this government, and now it looks like they do not regard their lives or safety either
attributes.background: Today, it has been revealed by the PM that the legal requirement to self isolate will end at the end of February. This cannot be allowed to happen as it will present a huge risk to vunrable people who have spent almost two full years shielding with little to no support.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606834
